projects.title: Intelligent Robot Guide Dog
projects.description: Developed a robotic assistance system based on the Unitree Go2 robot, integrating object recognition algorithms using YOLO, teleoperation capabilities, and environment description generation. The system focuses on assisting visually impaired users through remote operation and real-time object detection with audio feedback.

projects.title: Quantum Image Encoding
projects.description: Developed a quantum contrastive loss algorithm for encoding images into quantum states, optimizing state preparation for image classification tasks. Research presented at Instituto de FÃ­sica, UNAM.

projects.title: RPC Detector Simulations
projects.description: Implemented simulations of Resistive Plate Chambers using GEANT4, studying the effect of environmental variables on detector performance. Research on particle detection and data analysis using ROOT framework.
